subject: Baseball and Softball Saturday Schedule Update
body:
If you are having trouble reading this email, read the online version <Start time for the all baseball and softball games have been updated.

Baseball -

The first game on Saturday is now scheduled to start at 10am. The second game of the double header is scheduled to being 45 minutes after the end of game 1.

Softball -

Arkansas vs Southern Miss will start at 11am. LA Tech vs ULM will start 35 minutes after the conclusion of game 1.

All tickets for baseball and softball will allow access to the 3pm basketball game between the Dunkin' Dogs and Jax State. Come spend the day in Ruston and check out all of the exciting action.

Make sure you are following LA Tech Sports on social media for additional weather related updates.




#BARKLOUDER                                                 

"Facebook" <"Instagram" <"Twitter" <To manage which communications you would like to receive, or to unsubscribe, please click here <Louisiana Tech Athletics respects your privacy <Please note that by unsubscribing you are opting out of ALL email communications from Louisiana Tech Athletics.

Thomas Assembly Center
1650 West Alabama
Ruston, LA 71270

MODES

Forget the chocolates, we have

LEARN

XP



Happy Valentine's Day from Call
of Duty (

LOVE

Will you be our Valentine this
weekend? Play Black Ops 6 and Call of Duty: Warzone now to level
up faster with 2X Player XP, 2X Battle Pass XP, and 2X Weapon XP.
Plus, earn more GobbleGums with 2X the earn rate in Zombies. Runs
until February 18, 2025.

subject: Film Club - Malcolm X
body:
Hello Bulldogs! Next Monday, we will be watching and reviewing Spike Lee's Malcolm X. Because this is a longer movie, we will be starting this movie at 6 pm, an hour earlier than we usually start our meetings. As always, our meetings are free, fun, and open to all Tech students. Be sure to stay after the film to rate it and discuss it with us, and follow along on our Instagram to see our reviews from the past, as well as upcoming reviews for the rest of the year (@latechfilmclub).

What: Malcolm X (1992) (3h 22m)
When: Monday, February 17 at 6pm
Where: Woodard Auditorium

We hope to see you there!
Jackson Dammers
Film Club President
____________________________________
This email is sent through the Louisiana Tech batch email system.
